mapper.select: select fBoard_Num, fId, fTitle, fContent, fDate, fHit, fGroup, fStep, fIndent from FREE_BOARD order by fGroup desc, fStep asc
mapper.insert: insert into FREE_BOARD (fBoard_Num, fId, fTitle, fContent, fHit, fGroup, fStep, fIndent) values (free_board_seq.nextval, #{fId}, #{fTitle}, #{fContent}, 0, free_board_seq.currval, 0, 0)
update FREE_BOARD set fTitle = #{fTitle}, fContent = #{fContent} where fId = #{fId} and fBoard_Num = #{fBoard_Num}
update FREE_BOARD set fHit = fHit + 1 where fBoard_Num = #{fBoard_Num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from FREE_BOARD where fBoard_Num>0
mapper.insert: insert into free_reply (fBoard_Num, id, repNum, repCon) values (#{fBoard_Num}, #{id}, tbl_reply_seq.nextval, #{repCon})
